Subject: Hot Rod in battle
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod transformed and drove fast, Firestarter's shots hitting close
behind him. After all 20 shots had hit, Hot Rod transformed. He fired
six laser shots. Three on either side of Firestarter. He also fired two
missiles at Firestarter. The missiles headed right for him, and the
lasers on the side made it hard for him to barrel roll, without getting
hit.
